backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing order management, user profiles, authorization checks, and admin-only mutations with storage and blob handling mixins.
backend/old.mo: Defines legacy types for orders, user profiles, and actor state structure without active logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing UI files and components tied to removal of legal/novelty notices across multiple frontend pages.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file providing short descriptions for various frontend components, hooks, pages, and utilities.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Frontend deployment guide describing architecture, IC backend constraints, and steps for hosting the React app on cPanel.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS base with OKLCH theme variables, dark mode values, and styling resets.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint loading the React app via main.tsx with root container.
frontend/public/.htaccess: Optional Apache config enabling compression, caching, MIME types, and security headers for static hosting.
frontend/public/DEPLOYMENT.md: Frontend self‑hosting guide for deploying the React build to cPanel and connecting it to the IC backend.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Implements hash-based routing, admin access checks, and renders pages with navigation and authentication handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/PaymentCon: Admin form to update payment/contact status and notes with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/LoginRequiredScr: Displays a card explaining that login is required and offers a login button.
frontend/src/components/SignaturePad.tsx: Canvas-based signature input component with drawing, clearing, and change callbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries when changed.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Checks whether the authenticated user is an admin using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Provides React Query hooks for submitting orders, retrieving orders, and updating order or payment statuses using an actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Defines hooks for fetching and saving the current user's profile, with query invalidation and admin-status refresh logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, CSS variables for light/dark themes, typography rules, transitions, and layout overflow behavior.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrderDetai: Admin view for a single order with status badges, photo/signature previews, and payment contact controls.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Admin order list with search, filtering, stats, and navigation to individual order details.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero banner, navigation buttons, and feature sections describing the ID card service.
frontend/src/pages/MyOrdersPage.tsx: Displays the user's orders, handles authentication checks, and shows detailed views for selected orders.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows order confirmation details and an automatic payment info modal after an order is placed.
frontend/src/pages/OrderPage.tsx: Renders an authenticated order form with validation, photo/signature upload, and submission logic.
frontend/src/pages/PricesPage.tsx: Displays pricing details, feature list, and example tiers with navigation to the order page.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows and updates the user's profile information, handling authentication, loading, and admin access checks.
frontend/src/utils/assetPaths.ts: Provides helpers to generate base-path-safe URLs for assets and documents.
frontend/src/utils/fileValidation.ts: Includes image file validation and a utility to convert uploaded files to byte arrays.
frontend/src/utils/idGenerators.ts: Provides random full-name and address generators using local arrays and helper functions.
frontend/src/utils/orderFormatting.ts: Formats backend time and enum values into human‑readable order and payment status strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/usStates.ts: Exports a static list of US states for UI dropdowns.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending typography, colors, animations, and container settings with custom plugins.
project_state.json: JSON snapshot describing project metadata, existing features, and pending feature requests.
